sqlMap.select: select a.whs010id, a.whsgubun, a.whsname, a.whscotype, a.whscono, a.whslawcono, a.whsadress, a.whsbustype, a.accontdate, a.cmm020id from ismwhs010 a where 1 = 1 order by a.whsgubun, a.whsname

select a.byc010id, a.bycname, a.byctype, a.cogubun, a.cono, a.lawcono, a.coaddr, a.cobustype, a.account, a.accountno, a.useyn, a.purchaseform, a.attachname, a.byccode, a.uploadgubun, b.uploaddate, (select count(*) from ismodm010 suba, ismprd010 subb where suba.orderitemid = subb.itemcode and subb.byc010id = a.byc010id and suba.status = 1 and IFNULL(subb.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')) pocnt from ismbyc010 a left outer join ismpol010 b on a.byc010id = b.pol010id and b.pocotype = 'B' where 1 = 1 order by a.bycname

select IFNULL(b.poo010id,0) as poo010id, b.pocotype, IFNULL(b.isassign,'N') as isassign, IFNULL(b.orderfield, a.CODE) as orderfield, a.CODE_NM as orderfieldnm from LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE a left outer join ismpoo010 b on a.CODE = b.orderfield and b.poo010id = #poo010id# and b.pocotype = #pocotype# where a.CODE_ID = 'ISM010' order by b.fieldorder, CODE_DC
sqlMap.delete: delete from ismpoo010 where poo010id = #poo010id# and pocotype = #pocotype#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismpoo010 (poo010id, pocotype, isassign, orderfield, fieldorder) values (#poo010id#, #pocotype#, #isassign#, #orderfield#, #fieldorder#)
insert into ismpoo020 (byc010id, apiurl, apicontext, apiversion) values (#byc010id#, #apiurl#, #apicontext#, #apiversion#)
sqlMap.update: update ismpoo020 set apiurl = #apiurl#, apicontext = #apicontext#, apiversion = #apiversion# where byc010id = #byc010id#
sqlMap.select: select a.byc010id, a.apiurl, a.apicontext, a.apiversion from ismpoo020 a where a.byc010id = #byc010id#
